about.title: About {company}
about.subtitle: Founded in {year}, we eliminate the need for multiple vendors by becoming your {highlight} one-stop digital army{/highlight}, ensuring seamless, high-impact results under one roof.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with unified, cutting-edge IT solutions—delivering speed, creativity, and relentless efficiency.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where brands thrive digitally without fragmentation—Fredonbytes as the global standard for integrated tech excellence.

jana.name: Ing. Jana Nováková
jana.quote: If it's not scalable, it's not sustainable.

lucie.name: Lucie Dvořáková
lucie.quote: Pixel-perfect isn't a goal—it's the baseline.

tomas.name: Tomáš Horák
tomas.quote: Visibility without strategy is just noise.

founderQuote.quote: In a fragmented digital world, we are the glue—merging creativity, technology, and strategy into one unstoppable force.
founderQuote.author: Bc. Patrik "Fredon" Svoboda BSc., CEO & Founder

services.title: Our {highlight}Services{/highlight}
services.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive suite of IT solutions designed to eliminate the need for multiple vendors. From development to marketing, we've got you covered.

development.title: Software Development
development.description: Custom web applications, mobile apps, and enterprise solutions built with cutting-edge technologies.

design.title: Graphic & UX/UI Design
design.description: Stunning visual identities, user interfaces, and brand experiences that captivate and convert.

seo.title: SEO & Digital Marketing
seo.description: Data-driven strategies to boost your online visibility and drive targeted traffic to your business.

social.title: Social Media Management
social.description: Engaging content creation and strategic social media campaigns that build communities and drive growth.

consulting.title: IT Consulting & Cybersecurity
consulting.description: Strategic technology guidance and robust security solutions to protect and optimize your digital infrastructure.

services.cta: Discover How We Can Help You

contact.subtitle: Ready to transform your digital presence? Let's discuss your project and create something amazing together.
